def remove(self, certificate_arn): """ Removes a certificate.
:param certificate_arn: The ARN of the certificate to remove. """ try: self.acm_client.delete_certificate(CertificateArn=certificate_arn) logger.info("Removed certificate %s.", certificate_arn) except ClientError: logger.exception("Couldn't remove certificate %s.", certificate_arn) raise
